dashboard.title: Interexchange Scanner
dashboard.result.subtitle: Result
dashboard.select.subtitle: Select exchanges
dashboard.setting.subtitle: Customize your settings
dashboard.table.err.empty: At the moment, there are no spreads for the specified parameters.
dashboard.tooltip.hedge: When filling the cell, only spreads with the possibility of hedging will come. Learn more about hedging in {video}
dashboard.tooltip.height.risk: In the "high risk" mode, spreads greater than 10% will be added. Beginners are not recommended to select the "High risk" mode. Often large spreads occur in the case of pumps (a sharp increase in prices), which we advise you to skip, since the rate can fall sharply at any time.
dashboard.tooltip.volume: The optimal amount of the transaction, at which the maximum profit is achieved
dashboard.tooltip.range: Price range in orders when buying/selling on the market
dashboard.tooltip.orders: The number of executed orders when buying/selling on the market
dashboard.error.empty.sell.or.buy: You must select items in the "Purchase" and "Sale" sections
